page.title: 18Parents Against Drug Abuse
page.content:
We taped an interview with a mother who had become active in {Parents {Against Drug Abuse }because there had been a problem within her own family and she felt there was no help available.These are her thoughts.
{The cause of this problem is mainly {due to unemployment and boredom."Some {children at school are even taking {drugs."It can take six to eighteen {months to get off drugs. The age most affected by drugs is 16-25 years.The most affected area is the North End of Birkenhead. If people wanted drugs but couldn't afford them they would steal the money even sometimes from their own family; this is leading to split families. So the taking of drugs affects the whole of the family. { }
